title: Heavenly Nudes
description:
Get the ultimate warm nudes with this perfectly curated Cloud Whip trio!
Keep your head in the clouds with our liquid lipstick that delivers pillow-soft colour and cloud-like comfort for the blurred lip of your dreams.
Blurry cloud lips made easy - the whipped creamy texture glides on like butter for effortless colour that stays soft & diffused. 
Infused with cushiony Marshmallow Root Extract, antioxidant-rich Cloudberry Oil and hydrating Hyaluronic Acid, Cloud Whip keeps lips plush, nourished and on cloud nine.
Set Includes:
- Cloud Whip Blurring Liquid Lipstick in Fluffing Cute: Warm pink
- Cloud Whip Blurring Liquid Lipstick in Cloudy Hour: Warm toffee brown
- Cloud Whip Blurring Liquid Lipstick in Candy Floss: Warm nude

title: Beautiful Belle
description:
Nourish your lips with an enchanted rose mask then top them off with rosy shimmer for a princess-perfect pout!
Ultra Glossy Lip - Swipe on this rosy pink shade with a touch of pearly shimmer inspired by Belle. This smoothing, non-sticky gloss delivers plush shine, nourishing comfort and a touch of magic for a princess-perfect pout. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid to help hydrate and plump lips, Kakadu Plum to protect with Vitamin C and Sweet Cherry Oil to soften.
Enchanted Rose Lip Mask - Nourish your lips with our leave-on lip mask inspired by Beauty and the Beast that locks in moisture and softens lips with an enchanting rose flavor. Perfect for Disney fans, it comes in a rose-shaped jar just like the iconic one in the film! Ultra-hydrating Squalane replenishes dry lips while Shea Butter + Vitamin E moisturize and soften.
Set Includes:
- Ultra Glossy Lip in Mademoiselle Belle: Rosy pink
- Enchanted Rose Lip Mask

title: Princess Pout
description:
Shine like a Princess.
Our Ultra Glossy Lip Princess Collection features royal shades with a touch of pearly shimmer inspired by four iconic Disney Princesses. This smoothing, non-sticky gloss delivers plush shine, nourishing comfort and a touch of magic for a princess-perfect pout. This nostalgic collection turns happily ever after into a glow you can actually wear!
Infused with Hyaluronic Acid to help hydrate and plump lips, Kakadu Plum to protect with Vitamin C and Sweet Cherry Oil to soften.
Set Includes:
- Ultra Glossy Lip in Ambitious Tiana: Sheer gold
- Ultra Glossy Lip in Bright Ariel: Sparkling opal
- Ultra Glossy Lip in Mademoiselle Belle: Rosy pink
- Ultra Glossy Lip in Courageous Rapunzel: Pinky lilac

title: Sweet Sips
description:
Treat yourself or your bestie to our limited-edition holiday trio kit featuring all-new sparkly shades of this OG ColourPop fave – inspired by the sweetest sips!
Our award-winning crème-to-powder formula delivers supercharged colour in just one swipe. Get high impact colour with this long-lasting shadow that has minimal creasing, fading or fallout. Its unique bouncy texture is super creamy and insanely pigmented to take any look to the next level.
Perfect to gift (or keep), wear these dazzling shades alone for an easy holiday look, as an eyeshadow topper to amp up the sparkle or mix & match for festive combos!
Includes:
Coconut Cream & Soda Kit Trio (Pinky Nudes)
Super Shock Shadow in Sweet Sip: silvery taupe with pink + silvery pinpoints
Super Shock Shadow in Extra Ice: opal with pink, violet + silver pinpoints
Super Shock Shadow in Raspberry Fizz: pinky bronze with silvery pinpoints
Matcha & Mochi Kit Trio (Golden Nudes)
Super Shock Shadow in Whisk It All: vanilla with golden lime duochrome finish
Super Shock Shadow in Double Matcha: olive green with golden duochrome finish
Super Shock Shadow in Thanks So Mochi: opal with peachy gold duochrome finish
Milk Tea & Boba Kit Trio (Silver Plums)
Super Shock Shadow in Extra Sweet: soft silver with pink + violet pinpoints
Super Shock Shadow in Bobaholic: silvery blue with pinky plum duochrome finish
Super Shock Shadow in Hey Cutea: silvery plum with silver + pink pinpoints

title: Break the Spell
description:
A limited-edition Beauty and the Beast lip combo!
Get a royal pout with this warm brown lip duo inspired by The Beast! Our creamy Lux Lipstick delivers full-coverage pigment while Ultra Glossy Lip adds a shimmery high-shine finish. Perfect for Disney fans, it has everything you need to create the perfect nude lip.
PRODUCT IS NOT AVAILABLE TO SHIP TO MAINLAND CHINA, TAIWAN, HONG KONG SAR, AND MACAO SAR. FOR A FULL LIST, SEE OUR FAQ.

title: Flirty Talk
description: Accessorize your keys or bag with our first ever limited-edition keychain! Its retro hotel-inspired design gives all the Valentine’s Day vibes.

title: Flora
description: Swipe on our hi-shine, smoothing (never sticky) gloss and prepare to be obsessed. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid, Plum Kadaku, Sweet Cherry Oil, and Japanese Sumac for a nourished pout. Our flexible paddle applicator applies a perfect plush layer that looks and feels amazing. Choose from three flawless finishes: pearlized, crème and clear. Net Weight 3.2g (0.11oz)

title: Body Kabuki
description: Highlight your best assets exactly where you want it. The softest, 100% vegan bristles buff the perfect amount of product into your skin to create the look you want.

title: Galaxy
description:
Your eyes, leveled up.
Meet your new go-to eyeshadow stick for bold multichrome colour and easy glam. Shadow Stix deliver creamy, high-impact pigment in a single swipe and set to a long-lasting finish that won’t budge. Use it as an all-over lid colour, as a base to boost powder shadow or smudge it along the lash line for a quick smokey moment. Built-in sharpener = always on point.

title: Cutie Fruity
description: For the days when all you need is just a tint. Get the perfect sheer wash of colour in the comfiest, lightweight, super moisturizing formula. Loaded with Passion Fruit Oil, Coconut Oil, Marula Oil and Shea Butter to provide hydration for healthy, glowy lips with a hint of tint. Trust us, you’ll want to keep one in your purse, car, desk and vanity. Net Weight >2.10g (0.07oz)

title: Lil Vibe
description: This long-lasting crème-to-powder cheek formula is the BFF of our famous Super Shock Shadows! It shares the same unique bouncy texture that is extremely buildable and blends smoothly to leave the cheeks looking healthy. Build a natural flush to your heart’s desire. title: Holiday Drip
description:
Get 3 sweet festive flavors in one set!
Yummy. Glossy. Moisturizing. And now, Shimmering.
Fresh Kiss Glossy Lip Balm is that girl – your lip balm obsession, reimagined. It features the same formula you know and love, infused with Peptides to soften and nourish lips, Hyaluronic Acid to deeply hydrate, plus dimensional shimmer for an unreal glow. This plush, ultra-cushiony balm drenches lips with a glossy pearl finish and a hint of sheer colour. Now in trending flavors as irresistible as your fave sweet treat, it’s your perfect plus-one for every celebration.
Set Includes:


Whipped Cream: Sheer opal with silver + pink sparkle - cream flavor


Vanilla Matcha: Sheer gold with gold + silver sparkle - vanilla matcha flavor


Chocolate Cherry: Sheer black cherry with silver + gold sparkle - chocolate cherry flavor

title: A Little Dramatic
description:
Glossy shine. Soft stain. 
HydraPop’s water-based formula goes on glossy then fades into a soft tint – without drying out your pout. It delivers a soft wash of colour with a glossy finish that leaves your lips with a subtle, lived-in stain. 
 Each wearable shade features a refreshing gel-cream texture that feels weightless and comfy – never sticky. Swipe it your way, press lips together for a natural look or layer it on for all the drama.
 Infused with replenishing Squalane for maximum hydration and antioxidant-rich Guava + Lychee Extracts to keep lips soft and nourished.

Infused with Hyaluronic Acid, Plum Kakadu, Sweet Cherry Oil, and Japanese Sumac for a nourished pout. Our flexible paddle applicator applies a perfect plush layer that looks and feels amazing.

title: The Volturi
description: Our famous OG crème-to-powder formula delivers supercharged sparkling colour in new shades inspired by Twilight New Moon! One swipe of this long-lasting shadow is all you need to get high impact colour with minimal creasing, fading or fallout. Its unique bouncy texture is super creamy and insanely pigmented to take any look to the next level.

title: New Moon
description:
The saga continues with this limited-edition Twilight New Moon palette inspired by the iconic second film! Create endless fantasy looks with 15 oranges, golds and red smokey shades that represent the warm tones in each scene. Our ultra-pigmented pressed powder formula is long-lasting, applies evenly and blends like a dream for effortless application.
Features 3 finishes: Matte, Metallic, Pearlescent Glitter

title: Lock It In
description: Survived IRL from morning ballet to dinner with bestie! Lock It In Setting Spray is an ultra-fine waterproof + transfer-proof mist that locks your makeup in place for 16 hours with skin-loving ingredients. It sets your look with with a natural finish while boosting hydration. Infused with nourishing Peptides, smoothing Niacinamide and hydrating Aloe Vera.
